name: node-js-excersices
description: Todos + require http module from node + run createServer method on http and pass in a function with arguments request, response. The return from createServer should be saved as variable "server" [Docs](https://nodejs.org/api/http.html#http_http_createserver_requestlistener) + in the function. Run writeHead on response object and pass in variables 200 and an object with Content-Type: 'text/html' [Docs](https://nodejs.org/api/http.html#http_response_writehead_statuscode_statusmessage_headers) + Still in the function, run end on response object and pass in a string with HTML + Outside the function, run listen on the server object and pass in variable 8000 [Docs](https://nodejs.org/api/http.html#http_server_listen_port_hostname_backlog_callback) + Run "node server.js" in terminal and visit localhost:8000 in your browser + You have created a node.js web server, congrats
